pr_title: Replace Integer Options with Defaulted int

timeline.message: Replace Integer options with defaulted int

timeline.bodyText: Also document what happens if the user tries to set max delay to null.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -198,7 +199,8 @@ public Duration getRetryDelay() {
      *
      * @param maxRetryDelay The maximum duration requests will delay when the service is throttling.
      * @return The updated SearchIndexingBufferedSenderOptions object.
-     * @throws IllegalArgumentException If {@code maxRetryDelay.isNegative()} or {@code maxRetryDelay.isZero()} is true.
+     * @throws IllegalArgumentException If {@code maxRetryDelay.isNegative()} or {@code maxRetryDelay.isZero()} is

replies.bodyText: Currently null will revert back to the default, instead should it throw?
replies.author: alzimmermsft

timeline.message: Update Duration APIs to require non-null, changed Boolean to boolean
